control_attributes.control_description: The organization coordinates with [Assignment: organization-defined external organizations] to correlate and share [Assignment: organization-defined incident information] to achieve a cross-organization perspective on incident awareness and more effective incident responses.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization assigns [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] with responsibility for responding to information spills.

Control Statement: The organization coordinates with [Assignment: organization-defined external organizations] to correlate and share [Assignment: organization-defined incident information] to achieve a cross-organization perspective on incident awareness and more effective incident responses.
